resources.string: WT President bans homework! In a stunning decision, the University President has banned all homework assignments effective immediately. Professors are scrambling to comply with one noting \"It\'s pure chaos!\". Professors were seen crying in their classrooms while cheers could be heard from dorm rooms. University officials could not be reached for comment.

Residents of Canyon, Texas were left in awe yesterday as a mysterious object hovered over the picturesque town, fueling speculation of extraterrestrial activity. Witnesses reported seeing a glowing disc-shaped craft with pulsating lights gliding silently through the sky. Local authorities received multiple calls, prompting a flurry of excitement and curiosity among the community. While some skeptics dismissed the sighting as a mere optical illusion, others remain convinced that they witnessed a genuine UFO. Investigators are now examining photographs and video footage captured by enthusiastic onlookers in an effort to unravel the truth.
